First version !
Support for MyMangaDex saves.
All MyMangaDex functionalities (and more).
Support for 5 Services: MyAnimeList, Anilist, Kitsu, MangaUpdates and AnimePlanet.
Import/Export to all Services.
Import/Export to MangaDex.
Save Sync to Dropbox or Google Drive.
Auto-sync on Startup.
Save Viewer/Editor.
